text: Kot Ghulam Muhammad railway station (, Sindhi: ڪوٽ غلام محمد ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Mirpur Khas District
title: Kot Ghulam Muhammad railway station
